label: List of 10 things
value: Your response should be a list of 10, and only a list of 10 things.  Do not reply with anything else other than a list of 10 things.  Number the list 1., 2., 3., but otherwise you should not reply with anything else except the list.

label: Detailed and well written
value: It should be detailed and well written using beautiful grammer and great descriptions that leave the user captivated and amazed.

label: Simple

label: Technical
